# ca

Stored program general purpose computer implemented in Javascript. Based on the [nand2tetris](https://www.nand2tetris.org) computer architecture course.

Usage: ```node main.js -i```

Terminal output:

```
Running Bob in inspect mode.
Use Left Arrow and Right Arrow to step through Bob's state.
Use CTRL+C to quit.

State: 39 
CPU A register: 0000000000010100
CPU D register: 1111111111111100
CPU Program counter: 0000000000001011
Current instruction: 1000001100010001

Instruction memory:		Data memory:
[00] 0000000000000001		[00] 0000000000000011
[01] 1000110000001000		[01] 0000000000000011
[02] 0000000000000111		[02] 0000000000000111
[03] 1000110000010000		[03] 0000000000000000

[13] 1001110000010000		[13] 0000000000000000
[14] 0000000000000000		[14] 0000000000000000
```
